remarks: Property deduction for a normed group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
ngppropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
ngppropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
ngppropd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` K ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` L ) y ) ) $.
ngppropd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( dist ` K ) |` ( B X. B ) ) = ( ( dist ` L ) |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
ngppropd.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( TopOpen ` L ) ) $.
ngppropd $p |- ( ph -> ( K e. NrmGrp <-> L e. NrmGrp ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d ph x y $.
